books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: In 1965, a nursing student follows her brother to serve during the Vietnam War and returns to a divided America.
books.name: THE WOMEN

books.author: by Tana French
books.description: The life that a Chicago P.D. retiree has built in Ireland with a local woman and her daughter comes under threat.
books.name: THE HUNTER

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: A widow makes a fresh start in New York City and connects with her movie-star neighbor as they help others after a crisis.
books.name: NEVER TOO LATE

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training might require her to betray the man she loves.
books.name: IRON FLAME

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: A nurse practitioner at a maximum-security prison gave testimony against her former boyfriend that put him behind bars.
books.name: THE INMATE

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: A math teacher at Caseham High suspects there is more going on behind a scandal involving a teacher and a student.
books.name: THE TEACHER

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: A former couple pretend to be together for the sake of their friends during their annual getaway in Maine.
books.name: HAPPY PLACE

books.author: by C.J. Box
books.description: The 24th book in the Joe Pickett series. A man released from prison uses grizzly bear attacks to cover his acts of revenge.
books.name: THREE-INCH TEETH

books.author: by Ali Hazelwood
books.description: Issues of trust arise when an alliance is made between a Vampyre named Misery Lark and a Were named Lowe Moreland.
books.name: BRIDE

books.author: by Sarah J. Maas
books.description: The fifth book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Nesta Archeron is forced into close quarters with a warrior named Cassian.
books.name: A COURT OF SILVER FLAMES

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by Ashley Elston
books.description: A woman who works for a mysterious boss takes on a new identity to dig up information on someone.
books.name: FIRST LIE WINS

books.author: by James McBride
books.description: Secrets held by the residents of a dilapidated neighborhood come to life when a skeleton is found at the bottom of a well.
books.name: THE HEAVEN & EARTH GROCERY STORE

books.author: by Kennedy Ryan
books.description: After piecing her life back together, Soledad Barnes becomes attracted to someone she isn’t sure she can trust.
books.name: THIS COULD BE US
